items.title: Close National Parks if Government Shuts Down, Former Superintendents Plead
items.summary: More than 35 former park superintendents wrote a letter to the Trump administration, saying the lands could be damaged under limited staffing.

items.title: A Timeline of the Trump-Comey Relationship
items.summary: James B. Comey, the former F.B.I. director now under indictment, has long been a target of President Trump’s ire.

items.title: 4 Takeaways From Trump’s Securing of an Indictment Against Comey
items.summary: The president’s pressure on the Justice Department to charge one of his highest-profile retribution targets could have profound consequences.

items.title: Gabbard Ends Intelligence Report on Future Threats to U.S.
items.summary: Some issues in the document, which is issued every four years, had become politically inconvenient, former officials said.

items.title: A Broad Wave of Firings Followed Charlie Kirk’s Assassination
items.summary: More than 145 people in a wide range of occupations have been fired or disciplined after they made statements about the assassination of Charlie Kirk.

items.title: Federal Bureau of Prisons Ends Union Protections for Workers
items.summary: The union of prison employees condemned the contract’s termination, which is part of the Trump administration’s overhaul of the federal work force.

items.title: ACLU calls James Comey indictment ‘a grotesque abuse of presidential power’ – live updates
items.summary: <p>Civil rights group says ‘Trump has yet again proven his disdain for the principles that have actually made America great’; US president calls Comey a ‘dirty cop’</p><p><strong>Well, the president is awake.</strong></p><p>Donald Trump has posted the following on his Truth Social social media network:</p><p>JAMES COMEY IS A DIRTY COP. MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!</p><p>Whether you like Corrupt James Comey or not, and I can’t imagine too many people liking him, HE LIED! It is not a complex lie, it’s a very simple, but IMPORTANT one. There is no way he can explain his way out of it. He is a Dirty Cop, and always has been, but he was just assigned a Crooked Joe Biden appointed Judge, so he’s off to a very good start.

items.title: Several demonstrators arrested outside Netanyahu’s hotel ahead of UN speech
items.summary: <p>About two dozen protested after midnight, carrying flags and signs and calling out ‘baby killer’ and ‘free Palestine’</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2025/sep/26/gaza-israel-benjamin-netanyahu-un-united-nations-unga-west-bank-donald-trump-middle-east-crisis-live">Middle East crisis – latest updates</a></p></li></ul><p>Several demonstrators were arrested in the early hours of Friday outside the hotel where the Israeli prime minister, <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/benjamin-netanyahu">Benjamin Netanyahu</a>, is staying in New York <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2025/sep/26/gaza-israel-benjamin-netanyahu-un-united-nations-unga-west-bank-donald-trump-middle-east-crisis-live">ahead of</a> his scheduled speech on Friday morning at the <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/unitednations">United Nations</a> general assembly.</p><p>About two dozen people protested in a small but noisy gathering near Netanyahu’s hotel in the Lenox Hill neighborhood on the east side of Manhattan, not far from the UN building.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/26/benjamin-netanyahu-new-york-un-protest">Continue reading...</a>
